Issue.creator: jimthematrix@gmail.com
Issue.summary: change coverage to work with node 8 instead of 6
Issue.description: npm 5 uses sym links for local dependencies (those that have a file:// path instead of a package name in the package.json dependency entry), as a result istanbul needs to instrument different set of files (those in the source folder instead of under "node_modules") in order to properly report coverage
